meta.name: MySQL
meta.description: Dashboard for the telegraf input plug-in: MySQL
meta.author: InfluxData

cells.note: This dashboard gives you an overview of your MySQL Server and includes metrics from the `mysql_*` measurement populated by the [Telegraf MySQL Input Plugin](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mysql).

cells.name: InnoDB data

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("innodb_data_writes")) AS "writes", non_negative_derivative(mean("innodb_data_reads")) AS "reads" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host =:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("innodb_data_writes")) AS "writes", non_negative_derivative(mean("innodb_data_reads")) AS "reads" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host =:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mysql` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf MySQL plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mysql).

cells.name: Open Connections

queries.query: SELECT mean("threads_connected") AS "mean_threads_connected" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("threads_connected") AS "mean_threads_connected" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mysql` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf MySQL plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mysql).

cells.name: MySQL Connections

queries.query: SELECT mean("threads_connected") AS "open", mean("threads_running") AS "running" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("threads_connected") AS "open", mean("threads_running") AS "running" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mysql` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf MySQL plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mysql).

cells.name: InnoDB buffer pool size

queries.query: SELECT (mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total") * mean("innodb_page_size"))/1024/1024 AS "buffer total size" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT (mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total") * mean("innodb_page_size"))/1024/1024 AS "buffer total size" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mysql` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf MySQL plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mysql).

cells.name: InnoDB buffer usage

queries.query: SELECT (mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total") - mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_free")) / mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total") * 100 AS "mean_innodb_buffer_pool_pages_free" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT (mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total") - mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_free")) / mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total") * 100 AS "mean_innodb_buffer_pool_pages_free" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mysql` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf MySQL plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mysql).

cells.name: MySQL queries / sec

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("queries"),1s) AS "queries" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("queries"),1s) AS "queries" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mysql` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf MySQL plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mysql).

cells.name: MySQL sent bytes /sec

queries.query: SELECT  non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_sent"),1s) AS "bytes sent" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT  non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_sent"),1s) AS "bytes sent" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mysql` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf MySQL plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mysql).

cells.name: MySQL Connections/User

queries.query: SELECT mean("connections") AS "Connections" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql_users" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND host = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "user"

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("connections") AS "Connections" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql_users" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND host = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "user"

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mysql` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf MySQL plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mysql).

cells.name: MySQL slow queries

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("slow_queries")) AS "slow_queries" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("slow_queries")) AS "slow_queries" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mysql` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf MySQL plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mysql).

cells.name: MySQL received bytes / sec

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_received"),1s) AS "bytes received" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_received"),1s) AS "bytes received" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mysql` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf MySQL plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mysql).

cells.name: Network

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_recv"), 1s) AS "received", non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_sent"), 1s) AS "sent" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_recv"), 1s) AS "received", non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_sent"), 1s) AS "sent" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `net` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf Net plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/blob/master/plugins/inputs/net/NET_README.md).

cells.name: Total Memory

queries.query: SELECT last("total")/1024/1024/1024 AS "last_total" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mem" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT last("total")/1024/1024/1024 AS "last_total" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mem" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mem` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf Mem plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mem).

cells.name: System Uptime

queries.query: SELECT last("uptime")/86400 AS "mean_uptime" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."system" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host:  FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT last("uptime")/86400 AS "mean_uptime" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."system" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host:  FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `system` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf System plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/system).

cells.name: I/O

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("read_bytes"),1s) AS "read bytes", non_negative_derivative(max("write_bytes"),1s) AS "write bytes" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."diskio" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("read_bytes"),1s) AS "read bytes", non_negative_derivative(max("write_bytes"),1s) AS "write bytes" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."diskio" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `diskio` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf DiskIO plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/diskio).

cells.name: System Load

queries.query: SELECT mean("load1") AS "load1", mean("load5") AS "load5", mean("load15") AS "load15" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."system" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("load1") AS "load1", mean("load5") AS "load5", mean("load15") AS "load15" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."system" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `system` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf System plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/system).

cells.name: nCPU

queries.query: SELECT max("n_cpus") AS "mean_n_cpus" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."system" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host:

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT max("n_cpus") AS "mean_n_cpus" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."system" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host:

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `system` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf System plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/system).

cells.name: MySQL uptime

queries.query: SELECT last("uptime") / 86400 AS "uptime" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host:

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT last("uptime") / 86400 AS "uptime" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host:

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mysql` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf MySQL plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mysql).

cells.name: Memory usage

queries.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "last_used_percent" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mem" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "last_used_percent" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mem" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

colors.name: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mem` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf Mem plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mem).

cells.name: Max Connections

queries.query: SELECT mean("max_connections") AS "mean_max_connections" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql_variables" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("max_connections") AS "mean_max_connections" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mysql_variables" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `mysql` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf MySQL plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/mysql).

query.influxql: SHOW TAG VALUES ON :database: FROM :measurement: WITH KEY=:tagKey:
